channel.title: Delta client problem
channel.description:
ok when i load client it just starts then it will close and this will appear in cmds
[code] A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x05287c07, pid=4240, tid=7052
JRE version: 6.0_24-b07 Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (19.1-b02 mixed mode windows-x86 ) Problematic frame: C [PCTBDCore.dll+0xb7c07]
An error report file with more information is saved as: C:\Users\connor\Desktop\Blindamyst\Blind Amyst Client\hs_err_pid4240.log
If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code. See problematic frame for where to report the bug.
ress any key to continue . . .[/code]
